Package org.pdp.game

Interface IDungeon

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDungeonReadOnly
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Dungeon, MockModel
    public interface IDungeon
extends IDungeonReadOnly
    Represents the different mazes that a player can traverse through. It can have two types of location tunnel and caves. Tunnels have two exits exactly and caves have 1,2 0r 4 exits.

        y - y-coordinate
        Returns:

      • shootArrow

        Arrowtracer shootArrow​(int distance,
                       Direction direction)
        Returns a tracing object that has the directions that the arrow took. It also contains the number of hit the monster if any has taken at the destination.
        Parameters:
        distance - distance travelled by the arrow.
        direction - initial direction of the arrow.
        Returns:
        an ArrowTracer object that has a list of direction and hit s
